channel.name: XCA DQ Bulk Interface
channel.description:
XCA ITI-38 Bulk Interface channel - expects to receive a JSON array containing requests to be transmitted to the XCA ITI-38 Interface channel - takes individual requests and sends to the XCA ITI-38 Interface channel
Comments: - see example of the request here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1yKVHYyQPhkCHDo9Ow8lpT4vFHq7LY_9O
Last updated: Nov 14 2023

channel.name: XCA ITI-38 Processor
channel.description:
XCA ITI-38 Processor channel - Generates ITI-38 "Cross Gateway Query" SOAP message - Calls XCA endpoint - Processes responses

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Set stats
Generate Query Parameters
Store Query Parameters

properties.envelope: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:urn="urn:oasis:names:tc:ebxml-regrep:xsd:query:3.0" xmlns:urn1="urn:oasis:names:tc:ebxml-regrep:xsd:rs:3.0" xmlns:urn2="urn:oasis:names:tc:ebxml-regrep:xsd:rim:3.0"> <soap:Header>${SOAP_HEADER}</soap:Header> <soap:Body> <urn:AdhocQueryRequest id="?" comment="?" federated="false" federation="?" startIndex="0" maxResults="-1"> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:RequestSlotList> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:Slot name="?" slotType="?"> <urn2:ValueList> <urn2:Value>?</urn2:Value> </urn2:ValueList> </urn2:Slot> </urn1:RequestSlotList> <urn:ResponseOption returnType="RegistryObject" returnComposedObjects="false"/> <urn2:AdhocQuery id="?" home="?" lid="?" objectType="?" status="?"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:Slot name="?" slotType="?"> <urn2:ValueList> <urn2:Value>?</urn2:Value> </urn2:ValueList> </urn2:Slot> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:Name> <urn2:LocalizedString xml:lang="en-US" charset="UTF-8" value="?"/> </urn2:Name> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:Description> <urn2:LocalizedString xml:lang="en-US" charset="UTF-8" value="?"/> </urn2:Description> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:VersionInfo versionName="1.1" comment="?"/> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:Classification id="?" home="?" lid="?" objectType="?" status="?" classificationScheme="?" classifiedObject="?" classificationNode="?" nodeRepresentation="?"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:Slot name="?" slotType="?"> <urn2:ValueList> <urn2:Value>?</urn2:Value> </urn2:ValueList> </urn2:Slot> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:Name> <urn2:LocalizedString xml:lang="en-US" charset="UTF-8" value="?"/> </urn2:Name> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:Description> <urn2:LocalizedString xml:lang="en-US" charset="UTF-8" value="?"/> </urn2:Description> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:VersionInfo versionName="1.1" comment="?"/> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:Classification/> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:ExternalIdentifier id="?" home="?" lid="?" objectType="?" status="?" registryObject="?" identificationScheme="?" value="?"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:Slot name="?" slotType="?"> <urn2:ValueList> <urn2:Value>?</urn2:Value> </urn2:ValueList> </urn2:Slot> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:Name> <urn2:LocalizedString xml:lang="en-US" charset="UTF-8" value="?"/> </urn2:Name> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:Description> <urn2:LocalizedString xml:lang="en-US" charset="UTF-8" value="?"/> </urn2:Description> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:VersionInfo versionName="1.1" comment="?"/> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:Classification/> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:ExternalIdentifier/> </urn2:ExternalIdentifier> </urn2:Classification> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:ExternalIdentifier id="?" home="?" lid="?" objectType="?" status="?" registryObject="?" identificationScheme="?" value="?"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:Slot name="?" slotType="?"> <urn2:ValueList> <urn2:Value>?</urn2:Value> </urn2:ValueList> </urn2:Slot> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:Name> <urn2:LocalizedString xml:lang="en-US" charset="UTF-8" value="?"/> </urn2:Name> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:Description> <urn2:LocalizedString xml:lang="en-US" charset="UTF-8" value="?"/> </urn2:Description> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:VersionInfo versionName="1.1" comment="?"/> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:Classification id="?" home="?" lid="?" objectType="?" status="?" classificationScheme="?" classifiedObject="?" classificationNode="?" nodeRepresentation="?"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:Slot name="?" slotType="?"> <urn2:ValueList> <urn2:Value>?</urn2:Value> </urn2:ValueList> </urn2:Slot> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:Name> <urn2:LocalizedString xml:lang="en-US" charset="UTF-8" value="?"/> </urn2:Name> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:Description> <urn2:LocalizedString xml:lang="en-US" charset="UTF-8" value="?"/> </urn2:Description> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:VersionInfo versionName="1.1" comment="?"/> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:Classification/> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:ExternalIdentifier/> </urn2:Classification> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:ExternalIdentifier/> </urn2:ExternalIdentifier> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:QueryExpression queryLanguage="?"> e <!--You may enter ANY elements at this point--> gero </urn2:QueryExpression> </urn2:AdhocQuery> </urn:AdhocQueryRequest> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: SOAP Header
com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.script: // Set the required variables for the XCA Interop template var header = '<soap:Action xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing">urn:hl7-org:v3:PRPA_IN201305UV02:CrossGatewayPatientDiscovery</soap:Action>' + '<soap:MessageID xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing">urn:uuid:' + msg.id.toString() + '</soap:MessageID>' + '<soap:To xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing">' + msg.urlDQ.toString() + '</soap:To>' + '<soap:ReplyTo xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing">' + '<soap:Address>http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing/anonymous</soap:Address>' + '</soap:ReplyTo>'; channelMap.put('SOAP_HEADER', header.toString());

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: SOAP Body
com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.script: channelMap.put('MSG_ID', msg.id.toString()); channelMap.put('HomeCommunityId', msg.homeCommunityId.toString());

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Process response
CASE 1: One match
CASE 2: Multiple match
CASE 3: Multiple matches need refinement
CASE 4: No match
CASE 5: Application error

channel.name: XCPD ITI-55 Processor
channel.description:
XCPD ITI-55 Processor channel - Generates ITI-55 "Cross Gateway Patient Discovery" SOAP message - Calls XCPD endpoint - Processes responses
Last updated: Nov 24 2023

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Set stats
Generate Query Parameters
Generate SOAP Envelope

properties.envelope: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:urn="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <soap:Header>${SOAP_HEADER}</soap:Header> <soap:Body> <urn:PRPA_IN201305UV02 ITSVersion="XML_1.0"> <urn:id extension="${ID_EXT}" root="${ID_ROOT}"/> <urn:creationTime value="${CREATION_TIME}"/> <urn:interactionId extension="PRPA_IN201305UV02" root="2.16.840.1.113883.1.6"/> <urn:processingCode code="T"/> <urn:processingModeCode code="T"/> <urn:acceptAckCode code="AL"/> <urn:receiver typeCode="RCV"> <urn:device classCode="DEV" determinerCode="INSTANCE"> <urn:id root="${RCV_ID}"/> <urn:telecom value="${RCV_URL}"/> </urn:device> </urn:receiver> <urn:sender typeCode="SND"> <urn:device classCode="DEV" determinerCode="INSTANCE"> <urn:id root="${SND_OID}"/> <urn:asAgent classCode="AGNT"> <urn:representedOrganization classCode="ORG" determinerCode="INSTANCE"> <urn:id root="${SND_OID}"/> <urn:name>${SND_NAME}</urn:name> </urn:representedOrganization> </urn:asAgent> </urn:device> </urn:sender> <urn:controlActProcess classCode="CACT" moodCode="EVN">${ACT_PAYLOAD}</urn:controlActProcess> </urn:PRPA_IN201305UV02> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: SOAP Header
com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.script: // Set the required variables for the XCPD Interop template var header = '<soap:Action xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing">urn:hl7-org:v3:PRPA_IN201305UV02:CrossGatewayPatientDiscovery</soap:Action>' + '<soap:MessageID xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing">urn:uuid:' + msg.id.toString() + '</soap:MessageID>' + '<soap:To xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing">' + msg.urlXCPD.toString() + '</soap:To>' + '<soap:ReplyTo xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing">' + '<soap:Address>http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing/anonymous</soap:Address>' + '</soap:ReplyTo>'; channelMap.put('SOAP_HEADER', header.toString());

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: PRPA Payload
Process response
Case 1: One Match
Case 2: Multiple Match
Case 3: Multiple matches need refinement
Case 4: No Match
Case 5: Application Error

com.mirth.connect.plugins.directoryresou.name: [Default Resource]
com.mirth.connect.plugins.directoryresou.description: Loads libraries from the custom-lib folder in the Mirth Connect home directory.

com.mirth.connect.util.ConfigurationProp.comment: C-CDA US Realm Header transformation file location (with a trailing slash)
The name of the HL7v3 message sending organization (OPTIONAL)
The OID of the HL7v3 message sending organization (REQUIRED)
